• Multiplayer mining game with real-time server sync using MQTT
  • Procedural world generation with ore mining, crafting, and building
  • Upgrades, shop system, and inventory management with cloud saves
  • Cross-platform support with mobile controls and desktop keyboard input
  • Admin tools, teleporters, and explosive mechanics for advanced gameplay
    const TILE_PROPS = { [TILE_TYPES.COAL]: { name: "Coal", color: '#2c3e50', hardness: 2, value: 10, tier: 0 } };
    class GameEngine { constructor() { this.localPlayer = { id: uuid(), gridX: CONSTANTS.MAP_WIDTH/2, gridY: 4 }; } }

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining adventure game featuring real-time server synchronization, procedural world generation, and extensive upgrade systems. Players can mine resources, craft items, build structures, and explore with friends across dynamically generated underground worlds. The game includes mobile-optimized controls, cloud save functionality, and admin tools for managing multiplayer sessions.
